TopicTitle: Deadly Re-entry Heatshields missing in career mode?

Articles.Content:
See topic. They don't appear to be in the tech tree.

Given that this is the case, and that I've been unable to locate a parameter in the part.cfg file for them, does anybody have any idea how to fix this?

Make sure you're using the latest version of the mod.

Then check the first few nodes; IRCC they are very early in the tech tree.

I installed DRE yesterday, and there were a number of heatshields scattered around the early portions of the tech tree in my complete career file. Click on any of your unlocked nodes that now has a little number in the upper-right corner, then click on the new stuff to unlock it.
